qas.question: In what year did the tunnel open?
What was the name of Atlantic City's newest casino?
In what year was Wynn's plans for development scrapped?
The new roadway prompted a partnership between which two companies?

answers.text: Boyd Gaming in partnership with MGM/Mirage

context: Although Wynn's plans for development in the city were scrapped in <a3_0>2002<a3_0/>, the tunnel opened in <a0_0>2001<a0_0/>. The new roadway prompted <a4_0>Boyd Gaming in partnership with MGM/Mirage<a4_0/> to build Atlantic City's newest casino. <a1_0>The Borgata<a1_0/> opened in <a2_0>July 2003<a2_0/>, and its success brought an influx of developers to Atlantic City with plans for building grand Las Vegas style mega casinos to revitalize the aging city.
